mapper.select: SELECT count(o.id) as count FROM cs_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
SELECT cr.`status` FROM cs_returns cr WHERE cr.`status` != 1 AND cr.customer_id =#{customer_id} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC LIMIT 0,2

SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o.status, t.serial_num, o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` as zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone FROM cs_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.id, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time, o.return_price, o.bank_name, o.bank_account, o.reason,o.cs_cencel_id, t.serial_num,cc.templete_info_xml, o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` as zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone, cra.address ,cra.receiver,cra.phone as receiver_phone FROM cs_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id left join cs_cancels cc on o.cs_cencel_id = cc.id LEFT JOIN cs_receiver_addresses cra ON o.return_address_id = cra.id
WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_return_marks crm LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE crm.cs_return_id = #{id}
